SNAS.summary: Sino Assurance, Inc. provides surety and tendering guarantees, and financial services to government agencies, commercial companies, and individuals in the People's Republic of China. It offers construction guarantees, such as bid guarantees, performance guarantees, payment guarantees, advance payment guarantees, performance guarantees of sub-contract, performance bond guarantees, bank guarantees, quality warranty guarantees, and guarantees for credit certification, as well as employee guarantees. The company is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.
